Ripple Issue

  • What MDL Version: material-design-lite-1.2.1
  • What browser(s) is this bug affecting (including version)? Chrome Version 53.0.2785.116 (64-bit)
  • What OS (and version) are you using? OSX, 10.11.6
  • What are the steps to reproduce the bug?
    1. Resize browser until a scrollbar appears
    2. Scroll the menu button into view
    3. It's important to scroll, at least some pixels, to see the effect of this issue
    4. Click the button to open the menu
    5. The position of the content changes position while button ripple is animatings
    6. Click on a menu item to close the menu
    7. The position of the content changes while menu ripple is animating
  • What is the expected behavior? The position of the should stay fixed
  • What is the actual behavior? The position of the page content changes
